name: milligram-stylus
description: A minimalist CSS framework on Stylus version.
author: CJ Patoilo <cjpatoilo@gmail.com>

scripts.copy: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -rf src/* dist
scripts.stylus: rm -rf test && mkdir test && stylus src/milligram.styl --out test/milligram.css && stylus --compress src/milligram.styl --out test/milligram.min.css
scripts.build: run-s lint stylus autoprefixer copy banner
